attributes.action: order three aircraft carriers instead of the two planned which are similar in size and plane capacity of the original design.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Order three large aircraft carriers instead of the two planned. However, ensure the carriers have more armour and defence capabilities than the very limited armour which is planned. Do not let cost cutting limit the british armed forces or put them in unnecessary risks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
